version_description: • Fixes app crash while playing in background mode on iOS 8.

• Added Play/Shuffle options for playlists
• Tap on a song in a channel queue to move it to the front
• Minor improvements and bug fixes

• Apple Music and iTunes Match support!! Play music and create channels from your iCloud Music Library. Includes support for your older, DRM-protected iTunes files.
• UI enhancements and bug fixes
• New app icon
• Fixes a bug that could pause the channel after every song.
